questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image.
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar cod again
confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment
prepare the Damage / Incident and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230.

videos.src: assets/videos/EKF DIAGNOSTIC – QUO TEST/VIDEO FOR CHECKING WALL OULET VOLTAGE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO FOR CHECKING WALL OULET VOLTAGE

questions.question: shift the equipment to another place where AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord adapter and confirm whether the power cord is defective.
replace the power cord with a new one
check and confirm for any breakage or damage of input pin connector.
replace or repair the input pin connector accordingly
repair or replace the Control board accordingly
check and confirm screen shows message as “Insert the new cartridge and close the door” even after closing the door.
check and confirm whether there is any barcode damage of cartridge and check door is closed properly
replace the cartridge with a new one and close the door
check and confirm whether the results displayed are out of range.
check and confirm whether the cartridge is placed properly.
replace the cartridge in its slot
repair or replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the screens displays “ Too little blood” message.
replace the cartridge with a new one and make sure the sample is properly collected into the blood collector
check and confirm whether the screen displays “Too high blood” message
the blood is overfilled in the blood collector, so replace the cartridge with a new one
check and confirm whether the display is blank even after switching ON the equipment.
open the equipment as shown and check for any loose connection or breakage of cable from display to control board
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
repair or replace the display accordingly
check and confirm whether the buttons do not respond while pressing.
open the equipment as shown, check for any loose connections or breakage of cable from switch control board to keypad
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
repair or replace the switch control board accordingly

videos.videoName: Video for replacing switch control board

questions.question: IF THE PRONLEM IS NOT YET SOLVED, CONTACT THE TECHNICAL TEAM FOR ANY OTHER ASSISTANCE THROUGH VIDEO CALL
Thanks
